content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the telšiai district court the details of the case and the parties involved are not provided the defendant has been ordered to pay a total of €44275 for stamp duty and professional fees as well as an additional €17 for stamp duty the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property awarding the applicant a car however the applicant is required to pay the defendant compensation of €465 due to an unequal division of property the court has also granted credits to two companies uab and uab c which will be considered as joint obligations the document explains the progress of a legal case related to the civil code the plaintiff has submitted a claim seeking the dissolution of their marriage custody of their minor son and monthly maintenance payments from the defendant the plaintiff also wants the defendant to cover the childs expenses and legal costs the plaintiff claims that the marriage deteriorated due to the defendants disloyalty neglect disrespect and violence the defendant argues that both parties are at fault and seeks custody of the child and maintenance payments the court will divide the matrimonial property determine financial obligations and decide on access arrangements for the child the court has dissolved the marriage due to the fault of the defendant and awarded the applicant a car the defendant has been ordered to pay compensation for the unequal division of property and the costs of the proceedings
